title: SkinsRestorer皮肤插件问题
txt_content:
我开的是一个海岛服，服务端用的paperspigot1.12，一切正常，加入SkinsRestorer后，玩家进入服务器就出现如图的情况，将玩家传送至其他世界后地图就正常了，传送回来也正常，这个问题只在完后进服的时候出现[img]file:///C:/Users/Administrator.Z5LD8SBZJNK13NO/AppData/Roaming/Tencent/Users/739378469/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/~%0~B]XZ~%7BT75)C@K2%7BA[%7DQ.png[/img][img]file:///C:/Users/Administrator.Z5LD8SBZJNK13NO/AppData/Roaming/Tencent/Users/739378469/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/~%0~B]XZ~%7BT75)C@K2%7BA[%7DQ.png[/img][img]file:///C:/Users/Administrator.Z5LD8SBZJNK13NO/AppData/Roaming/Tencent/Users/739378469/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/~%0~B]XZ~%7BT75)C@K2%7BA[%7DQ.png[/img][img]file:///C:/Users/Administrator.Z5LD8SBZJNK13NO/AppData/Roaming/Tencent/Users/739378469/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/1S)(F[UT%7B8809VP4[PK0JSH.png[/img][img]file:///C:/Users/Administrator.Z5LD8SBZJNK13NO/AppData/Roaming/Tencent/Users/739378469/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/1S)(F[UT%7B8809VP4[PK0JSH.png[/img]file:///C:/Users/Administrator.Z5LD8SBZJNK13NO/AppData/Roaming/Tencent/Users/739378469/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/9AMWOM%ER3I4L3J9CJO4$BA.png，有什么解决的办法吗？或者当玩家进服是穿传送至一个固定的世界，再马上back回去
